parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.75

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array of type names of all vehicle's magazines.

When applied to a unit (soldier), the command behaves differently and will omit magazines already loaded into unit's weapons. Use [[currentMagazine]] to get this information for a currently loaded magazine.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''magazines''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[magazines]] [vehicle, includeEmpty] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.99.146475</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> includeEmpty: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[false]]) [[true]] to include empty magazines

</value></part><part><name> r2</name>=<value>[[Array]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mags = magazines [[player]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[currentMagazine]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[magazinesDetail]], [[magazinesAmmo]], [[magazinesAmmoFull]], [[ammo]], [[weapons]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">[[User:Ceeeb|Ceeeb]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In '''OFP v1.96''', if a weapon is loaded with an empty magazine, that magazine will still be counted by this command. The [[ammo|ammo]] command can be used to check if a unit has any ammunition into it is last magazine.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on 25 November 2011</dd>
<dt class="note>[[User:Dr_Eyeball|Dr_Eyeball]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command does not include non-turret weapon magazines, such as smoke, flare or chaff magazines which are usually declared in the root of the vehicle's class, rather than in the Turrets hierarchy.
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
